title: Last leaves;
author: Smith, Alexander
snippet: And I in Helen's arms lying On fair Kirkconnell Lee.

title: Last leaves;
author: Smith, Alexander
snippet: As I went doun the water side, None but my foe to be my guide, None but my foe to be my guide, On fair Kirkconnell Lee :

title: Last leaves;
author: Smith, Alexander
snippet: O think na ye my heart was sair When my love dropt doon and spak nae mair ! Then did she swoon wi' meikle care On fair Kirkconnell Lee.

title: Last leaves;
author: Smith, Alexander
snippet: I wish I were where Helen lies, Night and day on me she cries ; O that I were where Helen lies, On fair Kirkconnell Lee !
